--- create_table_types.sql
create table types (
  b bool,
  i int64,
  f32 float32,
  f float64,
  d date,
  t timestamp,
  s string(256),
  smax string(max),
  bs bytes(256),
  bsmax bytes(max),
  ab array<bool>,
  abs array<bytes(max)>,
  p examples.ProtoType,
) primary key (i)

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen: 252,
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 18,
        Name: "types",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 23,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name: "b",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name: "BOOL",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 33,
        NameEnd: 34,
        Name: "i",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 35,
        Name: "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },

      Null: -1,

        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 47,

        NamePos: 171,
        NameEnd: 173,
        Name: "ab",

        Array: 174,

          NamePos: 180,
          Name: "BOOL",

      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 189,
        NameEnd: 192,

        Array: 193,
        Gt: 209,

          NamePos: 199,

          Name: "BYTES",
          Max: true,

      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 214,
        NameEnd: 215,
        Name: "p",
      },
      Type: &ast.NamedType{
        Path: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 216,
            NameEnd: 224,
            Name: "examples",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 225,
            NameEnd: 234,
            Name: "ProtoType",
          },
        },
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 251,
        NameEnd: 252,
        Name: "i",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE types (b BOOL, i INT64, f32 FLOAT32, f FLOAT64, d DATE, t TIMESTAMP, s STRING(256), smax STRING(MAX), bs BYTES(256), bsmax BYTES(MAX), ab ARRAY<BOOL>, abs ARRAY<BYTES(MAX)>, p examples.ProtoType) PRIMARY KEY (i)
